content:
`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.BEGIN_TIME`, `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` and `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY.UNO` fields. * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed; instead, `status`(see Mapping for details) is updated based on the retrieved data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |rosterId| | |Data Handling Operation| |tripId|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` = “0“
then null else `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`| |dutyId|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` = “0“
then null else `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`| |legId| | |N/A in the source system.| |crewId|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`TLC`| | |type|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`CODE`| | |pickup|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`AIRPORT_C_IS_DEP`| | |destination|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`AIRPORT_C_IS_DEST`| | |startDate|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|**Tracking Duty:** `BEGIN_DATE`, `BEGIN_TIME`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `DEPARTURE_DATE_SCD`, `DEPARTURE_TIME_SCD`|**Tracking Duty:** `BEGIN_DATE` + `BEGIN_TIME`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `DEPARTURE_DATE_SCD` + `DEPARTURE_TIME_SCD`| |endDate|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|**Tracking Duty:** `END_DATE`, `END_TIME`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `ARRIVAL_DATE_SCD`, `ARRIVAL_TIME_SCD`|**Tracking Duty:** `END_DATE` + `END_TIME`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `ARRIVAL_DATE_SCD` + `ARRIVAL_TIME_SCD`| |status|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|**Tracking Duty:** `DMLTYPE$$`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `DMLTYPE$$`, `OLD_NEW$$`|**Tracking Duty:** when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.DMLTYPE$$` = “D“
then “CANCELLED“ else “ACTIVE“
**Tracking Duty Item:*
